title: Suppressing script issue
author: spisarau
body_snippet:
In our company to access corporate resources SSO method of authentication is used. But when I try to access resources via mRemoteNG for some of them I am not able to get access. I receive authentication issue. 
I investigated this issue and  found out that the cause of it is enabled ScriptErrorsSuppressed option for WebBrowser component. After I disabled it, I received some script errors, but I could access corporate recourses without any further errors. 
Also ScriptErrorsSuppressed for some s...
